body_html:
It looks like your symlinks aren't set up properly -- you have both v3 and v4 installed, libcudnn.so points to so.7.0, which is v3

Secondly, your LD_LIBRARY_PATH doesn't have /home/sal/cuda/lib64 in it

Secondly, your LD_LIBRARY_PATH doesn't have /home/sal/cuda/lib64 in it
body:
It looks like your symlinks aren't set up properly -- you have both v3 and v4 installed, libcudnn.so points to so.7.0, which is v3

Secondly, your LD_LIBRARY_PATH doesn't have /home/sal/cuda/lib64 in it
